channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘He is controlling and narcissistic’: My father-in-law stole my late husband’s savings — and even took ownership of our home. What can I do?
item.description: “Law enforcement says they can’t prove that he forged signatures, so no charges can be filed.”

item.title: Dow, Nasdaq Futures Fall; Meta, Microsoft Sell Off
item.description: Nasdaq-100 futures were leading losses premarket, down roughly 1%, as investors scoured afterhours results from Microsoft and Meta Platforms.

item.title: Why Apple shareholders may want the Tim Cook era to come to a close
item.description: Does Apple’s current leadership possess the necessary vision and agility to manage a challenging AI future?

item.title: Gold Supported by Macro Risks, U.S. Election Uncertainty
item.description: Gold edged lower but hovered around record highs, with ANZ Research saying the market appears to be positioning for a high level of uncertainty ahead ...

item.title: Oil Edges Higher on Demand Optimism
item.description: Oil prices edged higher in Europe, supported by positive signs on U.S. fuel demand and improvements in top crude importer China.and a Reuters report t...

item.title: ‘It was obvious I wasn’t in Kansas anymore’: My local bank has no cashiers — and it went downhill from there. What’s happened to all the banks?
item.description: “‘A man stepped out of an office and asked what I needed. I told him I needed to deposit cash into my account.”

item.title: Sterling Could Rise Further on Prospects of Moderate BOE Rate Cuts
item.description: Sterling was a touch higher against the dollar and UBS said relatively higher U.K. interest rates compared with rates elsewhere, should favor the poun...

item.title: This retirement expert saved her mom $1,200 on Medicare drugs — and she’s got advice for you, too
item.description: It took many frustrating years for Marcia Mantell to convince her mom to let her help.

item.title: Meta and Microsoft: AI's Spending Champs Won't Be Tapping the Brakes.
item.description: Sharply rising capital investments show no sign of slowing as the latest reports fail to excite investors.

item.title: French banks diverge as Société Générale shares surge, BNP Paribas stock sinks
item.description: France’s top two banks saw their share prices take rival trajectories on Thursday as Société Générale shares surged on news of a management shakeup wh...
